alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Hamilton; Wabash; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 18 at 2:49PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...An area of moderate rainfall is lifting north through southern Illinois causing some flooding of flood prone areas. * WHERE...Portions of Illinois and Indiana, including the following counties, in Illinois, Edwards, Hamilton, Wabash, Wayne and White. In Indiana, Gibson and Posey. * WHEN...Until 600 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 247 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mount Carmel, Carmi, Fairfield, Mcleansboro, Albion, Grayville, Lancaster, Owensville, Poseyville, Wayne City, West Salem, New Harmony, Crossville, Cisne, Enfield, Dahlgren, Jeffersonville, Bellmont, Sims and Bone Gap. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
